title: i cannot open lol
body: i dont know why i keep pressing lol to open but it does not open . Any suggestions?

replies.body: The patcher needs permission from your OS to launch, otherwise it can stay in a dormant state or give an error message.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help get this fixed up.  Hope that helps!
